mapper.select: SELECT material_cost FROM material WHERE temp_category_code = #{tempCate} AND size_category_code = #{sizeCate}
SELECT sizecategory.category_code as size_category_code, sizecategory.category_small as sizecate FROM category as sizecategory WHERE sizecategory.category_middle = 'size'
SELECT tempcategory.category_code as temp_category_code, tempcategory.category_small as tempcate FROM category as tempcategory WHERE tempcategory.category_middle = 'Temp'
SELECT item_code, item_name FROM item WHERE item_category_code != '606' AND item_category_code != '607'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material( material_code, menu_code, temp_category_code, size_category_code, item_code, material_measure, material_cost ) VALUES ( #{materialCode}, #{menuCode}, #{tempCategoryCode}, #{sizeCategoryCode}, #{itemCode}, #{materialMeasure}, #{materialCost} )
mapper.select: SELECT material.material_code, menu.menu_name, tempcategory.category_small AS tempcate, sizecategory.category_small AS sizecate, item.item_name, material.material_measure, material.material_cost FROM material INNER JOIN menu ON material.menu_code = menu.menu_code INNER JOIN item ON material.item_code = item.item_code INNER JOIN category AS tempcategory ON material.temp_category_code = tempcategory.category_code INNER JOIN category AS sizecategory ON material.size_category_code = sizecategory.category_code
mapper.update: UPDATE material SET menu_code=#{menuCode}, temp_category_code=#{tempCategoryCode}, size_category_code=#{sizeCategoryCode}, item_code=#{itemCode}, material_measure=#{materialMeasure}, material_cost=#{materialCost} WHERE material_code=#{materialCode}
